handy.title: Handy
handy.description: The original project that made PaperFlow possible
handy.details: PaperFlow is built upon the incredible foundation of Handy, created by CJ Pais. His vision of making speech-to-text accessible, private, and delightful inspired everything you see here. We're deeply grateful for his open-source contribution to the community. Thank you, CJ, for sharing your work with the world.

tauri.title: Tauri
tauri.description: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop applications
tauri.details: Tauri is the backbone that makes PaperFlow feel native on every platform. This remarkable framework lets us deliver a lightweight, secure app without the bloat. Huge thanks to the Tauri team for proving that desktop apps can be both beautiful and efficient.

parakeet.title: NVIDIA Parakeet
parakeet.details: Parakeet brings lightning-fast, incredibly accurate transcription to PaperFlow. Built by NVIDIA's brilliant NeMo research team, it understands English like a native speaker and runs beautifully on your local machine. A heartfelt thank you for making this magic possible.

whisper.title: OpenAI Whisper
whisper.description: Multilingual speech recognition that just works
whisper.details: Whisper opened the door to truly accessible speech recognition. Thanks to OpenAI for training and releasing this incredible model, and to Georgi Gerganov for whisper.cpp which makes it fly on local hardware.

moonshine.title: Moonshine
moonshine.details: Moonshine proves that great things come in small packages. This lightweight model delivers impressive accuracy while being incredibly fast. Thank you to the Useful Sensors team for creating something so elegantly efficient.

silero.title: Silero VAD
silero.description: Voice Activity Detection that knows when you're speaking
silero.details: Silero VAD is the unsung hero that listens for your voice and filters out the silence. It's what makes PaperFlow feel responsive and intelligent. Thanks to the Silero team for this essential piece of the puzzle.

groq.title: Groq
groq.details: When you need the cloud, Groq delivers transcription at unprecedented speeds. Their LPU technology is genuinely impressive, and their generous API makes high-quality cloud transcription accessible to everyone.

rust.title: Rust
rust.description: A language empowering everyone to build reliable software
rust.details: Rust powers PaperFlow's backend with its promise of safety and performance. To the Rust community: thank you for creating a language that makes writing correct, fast code a joy rather than a chore.

react.title: React
react.description: The library for building user interfaces
react.details: React makes PaperFlow's interface feel smooth and responsive. Thanks to Meta and the countless contributors who've made frontend development so much more pleasant.

community.title: Open Source Community
community.details: PaperFlow exists because of thousands of open-source contributors who share their work freely. From the smallest utility library to the largest framework, every contribution matters. Thank you all for believing in a world where knowledge is shared.
